articles.content: Thomas Tuchel knew a swarm was again coming to Stamford Bridge. This time he was going to make sure his Chelsea players were prepared, that there was a ready-made solution in place. There would be no… [+4505 chars]

articles.title: Lewis Hamilton reveals he phoned F1 rival Max Verstappen after Silverstone crash - Daily Mail
articles.description: The pair collided at 180mph at Copse corner on the opening lap of the Silverstone race back in July and the Brit has disclosed that he reached out to Verstappen following the incident.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton has revealed he spoke to title rival Max Verstappen over the phone following their crash at the British Grand Prix earlier this year.
The Mercedes and Red Bull drivers have been locke… [+2839 chars]
